title: why did they gut taliyah
body:
riot was too angry that taliyah was too good at roaming and waveclear so they nerfed her waveclear

then riot was too angry that taliyah was too good at jungling so they gut her 

now she is shit at everything and on top of that they wont give her any skins

wtf did she do to riot
